channel.title: Books Insane Dad Matiss on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Books Insane Dad Matiss on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: heh.
item.description: i have accidently slept every night until about 1 for the past 3 days. I come home from work and “read” a book and then wake up in the middle of the night. tonight I caught myself and woke up at 11:45. wheee.i am reading these insane fantasy novels that matiss lent me. I don’t usually like fantasy nobels - however these are incredible. they are called the “vlad taltos” books - the first being called “jhereg”.
